医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新的肝炎B疫苗的表现优于医疗保健工作者的标准助推器由于职业暴露于血液和体液，卫生保健工作者患乙型肝炎感染的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-hepatitis-b-vaccine-utperforms-perforforms-sandard-boosters-boosters-boosters-nealth-care-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-hepatitis-b-vaccine-utperforms-performs-sandard-boosters-boosters-boosters-nealth-care-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA34C05A-024A-42F6-813A-DF47AEAE4656A1 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:57:36 -0400 New hepatitis B vaccine outperforms standard boosters in health care workers
预期和新父亲表示需要在怀孕和分娩期间获得更多支持一项新的宾夕法尼亚州护理研究表明，预期和新的父亲，尤其是黑人美国父亲，表示对更多的资源和支持，以更好地帮助母亲在怀孕和分娩期间为母亲提供帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/expectant-and-new-fathers-new-fathers-express-the--need-for-more-support-dring-dring-dring-pregnancy-and-childbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/expectant-and-new-fathers-new-fathers-express-the----------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7057c0f-19f8-421d-a268-9d9e403b7865 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:47:04 -0400 Expectant and new fathers express the need for more support during pregnancy and childbirth
新的AI模型可预测ICU中的败血症死亡率败血症是重症监护病房（ICU）中最致命的条件之一，它是由人体对感染的失控反应触发的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-ai-model-predicts-sepsis-sepsis-mortality-in-the-the-iCu-with-with-thigh-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-ai-model-predicts-sepsis-sepsis-mortality-in-the-icu-with-with-with-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8403cd2-FEDC-4237-A865-C3E85E5751CC Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:24:01 -0400 New AI model predicts sepsis mortality in the ICU with high accuracy
涉及运动疾病的新脑电路可以帮助改善代谢健康晕车是一种非常普遍的疾病，影响了大约三分之一的人，但是所涉及的大脑电路在很大程度上未知。在自然代谢发表的当前研究中，贝勒医学院，德克萨斯大学健康科学中心的研究人员以及德克萨斯州儿童医院的Jan和Dan Duncan神经研究所描述了涉及运动疾病的新脑电路，这也有助于调节体温和代谢平衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-brain-circuit-ind-involved-in-motion-sickness-cold-could-help-help-improve-metabolic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/new-brain-circuit-in-news-involved-in-motion-sickness-cold-could-help-help-improve-metabolic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6EFCC515-D452-4FF6-AC05-579B2DA0816D Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:20:52 -0400 New brain circuit involved in motion sickness could help improve metabolic health
Besifovir Dipivoxil Maleate提供了可比的疗效和改善乙型肝炎患者的安全性丙型肝炎是肝炎病毒（HBV）的一种肝感染，而持续六个月的长期丙型肝炎感染被认为是“慢性”的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/besifovir-dipivoxil-maleate-maleate-compers-combalable-felmable-felficacy-and-smefficacy-and-mprach---------------------效力 - hepatitis-for-hepatitis-b-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/besifovir-dipivoxil-maleate-maleate-offers-combalable-felmable-felmable-felficacy-and-mprast------------------------------效果 - hepatito-hepatititis-b-patients.aspx#comment.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca857E09-4069-484D-94A5-59C3EC2F3809 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:16:23 -0400 Besifovir dipivoxil maleate offers comparable efficacy and improved safety for hepatitis B patients
研究链接2型糖尿病与大脑中的奖励信号弱具有精神病或神经退行性疾病的2型糖尿病（T2D）的高合并症表明需要了解这些疾病的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/study-links-type-2-diabetes-to-weakened-weakened-reward-signals-signals-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/study-links-type-2-diabetes-to-weakened-weakened-warken-ward-reward-signals-in-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09833197-AD31-4F21-BA51-066FBBBBC17B2 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:05:17 -0400 Study links type 2 diabetes to weakened reward signals in the brain
在海星和人类中发现的古代食欲控制分子伦敦皇后大学的一个生物学家团队发现，人类控制食欲的神经激素具有古老的进化起源，其历史可追溯到十亿年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/ancient-appetite-contore-control-molecule-molecule-found-in-starfish-and---------- and-humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/ancient-appetite-contore-molecule-molecule-molecule-found-in-starfish-an-starfish-and-humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA9EF7D2-DC17-4124-976C-434D93460766 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 22:00:16 -0400 Ancient appetite-control molecule found in starfish and humans
基于家庭的生活方式干预措施可以减轻体重和心血管风险在印度进行的家庭干预措施的生活方式干预计划（多产）研究计划，旨在评估具有早产冠心病家族史的人群中基于家庭的生活方式方法是否可以改善体重管理和与肥胖有关的健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/family-base--pable--pablecroce-to-lifestyle-interventions-weight-weight-weight-and-weight-and-cardiovascular-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/family-base--pable--pablecret-to-lifestyle-interventions--REDECES-weight-weight-and-and-cardiovascular-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A70AD72A-C090-459D-A761-8D420CB6EBFB Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:30:00 -0400 Family-based approach to lifestyle interventions can reduce weight and cardiovascular risks
长期吸入的皮质类固醇与COPD患者的健康风险增加有关吸入皮质类固醇（ICS）通常用于慢性阻塞性肺疾病（COPD），但不建议作为一线治疗，除非患者哮喘/COPD重叠或频繁加重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Long-term-inhaled-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-COPD-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Long-term-inhaled-corticosteroids-linked-to-increased-health-risks-in-COPD-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2695ED65-AE9F-4F2B-A27E-933AE-933AE4C1AAB4 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:25:56 -0400 Long-term inhaled corticosteroids linked to increased health risks in COPD patients
科学家发现M6a在前列腺癌进展中的作用加州大学洛杉矶分校卫生的科学家乔森森综合癌症中心和多伦多大学揭示了RNA中的微小化学修饰（称为M6A）如何在前列腺癌的进展中起着至关重要的作用，包括推动其某些最危险的疾病形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/scientist-uncover-uncover-role-f-m6a-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/scientists-uncover-uncover-role-of-m6a-in-prostate-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7AAD84DD-0532-4A07-4A07-AE76-BC92110DFC89 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 21:22:38 -0400 Scientists uncover role of m6A in prostate cancer progression
